DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_pickuporder x left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x0 on x.deliverymode=x0.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x1 on x.deliverymethod=x1.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x2 on x.orderstatus=x2.statuscode left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x3 on x.fromcityid=x3.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x4 on x.tocityid=x4.cityid left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x5 on x.packagetype=x5.typecode left join tms.ar_customer a on x.customerid=a.ar_customer_id
DbDetails.Queryformat: select %{data} from (select x.xtmst_pickuporder_id from %{dbtable} where x.carrierid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.xtmst_pickuporder_id ORDER BY x.xtmst_pickuporder_id) t
